ERASESTART.desc: Clear all spectrums and start acquiring

NBINS.desc: Number of bins to use in spectrum

TREAL.desc: Real time since start of acquisition

TDWELL.desc: Set integration time [s] for incrementing bin number

BINADV.desc: Set internal or external bin advance signal

simpleMotor.desc: Small Vertical Focusing Mirror PITCH Motor
simpleMotor.name: SVFM.PITCH

simpleMotor.desc: Small Vertical Focusing Mirror Y Motor
simpleMotor.name: SVFM.Y

simpleMotor.desc: Small Horizontal Focusing Mirror PITCH Motor
simpleMotor.name: SHFM.PITCH

simpleMotor.desc: Small Horizontal Focusing Mirror X Motor
simpleMotor.name: SHFM.X

simpleMotor.desc: Small Vertical Focusing Mirror Curve Motor
simpleMotor.name: SVFM.CURVE

simpleMotor.desc: Small Vertical Focusing Mirror Ellipticity Motor
simpleMotor.name: SVFM.ELLIP

simpleMotor.desc: Small Horizontal Focusing Mirror Curve Motor
simpleMotor.name: SHFM.CURVE

simpleMotor.desc: Small Horizontal Focusing Mirror Ellipticity Motor
simpleMotor.name: SHFM.ELLIP

END.desc: Warm to room temp and stop

ShutterOpenEPICSCmd.desc: Open command to be sent to ShutterOpenEPICS

ShutterCloseEPICSCmd.desc: Close command to be sent to ShutterCloseEPICSPV

ShutterStatusEPICSPV.desc: PV to read ShutterStatusEPICS_RBV from. Must be a "CP" link

ShutterStatusEPICSCloseVal.desc: Value of ShutterStatusEPICSPV when shutter is closed

ShutterStatusEPICSOpenVal.desc: Value of ShutterStatusEPICSPV when shutter is open

ShutterCloseEPICSCmd.desc: Close command to be sent to ShutterCloseEPICSPV

ShutterStatusEPICSCloseVal.desc: Value of ShutterStatusEPICSPV when shutter is closed

ShutterStatusEPICSOpenVal.desc: Value of ShutterStatusEPICSPV when shutter is open
